description: A massive bird, stumbling about on two mechanical legs. It darts its head about as it searches for prey, its huge beak snapping open and closed like a pair of scissors

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s tears into you with its razor-sharp beak!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %1$s tears into <npcname> with its razor-sharp beak!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s tears into your %2$s with its razor_sharp beak, but it glances off your armor!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s tears into <npcname>'s %2$s, but it glances off their armor!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %s tries to tear into you with its beak, but you evade it!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %s tries to tear into <npcname> with its beak, but they evade it!
